info.title: Dédalo Web REST API
info.description: Build Public Dédalo data for publication

tags.name: Video view
tags.description: Utils for get video player general data

lang.name: lang
lang.description: Query lang filter. Use Dédalo lang format like lg-eng for english. If undefined, API server settings default lang is used

get.description: Get complete info about current disposable tables and columns.

post.description: Search records with current params in requested table.

parameters.name: ar_fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of required columns in table.

parameters.name: section_id
parameters.description: Filter by specific section_id. Like 1

parameters.name: sql_fullselect
parameters.description: Custom sql select for builds query. Replaces any other columns selection option

parameters.name: sql_filter
parameters.description: Custom query added to standar filter

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Custom order for result.Set null for no sort

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximun records returned in query. 0 for no limit

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Custom group query for sql like 'lang'

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Custom records offset for query

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Activates total records counter for pagination

parameters.name: resolve_portal
parameters.description: Activates automatic resolution of portals option. Default is false

post.description: Resolve all terms used in the indexation of the given reel transcription (audiovisual record).

parameters.name: av_section_id
parameters.description: audiovisual section id

post.summary: Build fragment of text and video from a index locator
post.description: Calculate all fragments indexed with this locator.

parameters.name: index_locator
parameters.description: locator object encoded as json like {"section_tipo":"rsc167","section_id":"1","tag_id":"1"}

post.summary: Get first level of terms from thesaurus
post.description: Return a array of 'ts_term' objects with resolved data. You can use only the data or (in PHP) manage 'ts_term' objects to build custom html.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Optional comma separated names of thesaurus tables. If undefined, server config thesaurus tables are used

parameters.name: parents
parameters.description: Optional comma separated parents used as roots like 'hierarchy1_245,hierarchy1_253'. If defined, override default behaviour (from first elements of table like 'ts1_1)

parameters.name: exclude_tld
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of tld to exclude like 'xx,rt'

post.description: Return a random term from thesaurus tables

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Optional comma separated names of thesaurus tables. If undefined, server config thesaurus tables are used

parameters.name: exclude_tld
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of tld to exclude like 'xx,rt'

post.description: Execute a search against thesaurus tables

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Optional comma separated names of thesaurus tables. If undefined, server config thesaurus tables are used

parameters.name: exclude_tld
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of tld to exclude like 'xx,rt'

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: string to search in database. Minimun 3 chars for full text search

parameters.name: rows_per_page
parameters.description: Pagination preference. One row per page is the default value

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Pagination preference. Current page number. One is default

parameters.name: tree_root
parameters.description: Defines first element from build the hierarchy tree when show the reults. Accepted values first_parent | last_parent . Default is last_parent

post.description: Search string in database (begings with $q) and get array of max 25 records

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Optional comma separated names of thesaurus tables. If undefined, server config thesaurus tables are used

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: string to search in database. Minimun 3 chars for full text search

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of records returned. Undefined uses default of 25

post.summary: Get thesaurus term objects (one or various)
post.description: Resolve one or more ts_term from ar_term_id

parameters.name: ar_term_id
parameters.description: Comma separated list of one or various term_id like 'ts1_1,ts1_2'

post.summary: Indexation object with all required info

parameters.name: term_id
parameters.description: Term id like 'ts1_1'

parameters.name: ar_locators
parameters.description: json encoded array of locators like [{locator1},{locator2}]

parameters.name: image_type
parameters.description: Selects type of image to use. Values are 'identify_image', 'posterframe'. Default is posterframe

post.description: Gets data ued to view video fragment

parameters.name: term_id
parameters.description: Term id to get data like ts1_1

parameters.name: ar_locators
parameters.description: JSON ecoded array of locator objects like [{"type":"dd96","tag_id":"2","section_id":"1","section_tipo":"rsc167","component_tipo":"rsc36","section_top_id":"1","section_top_tipo":"oh1","from_component_tipo":"hierarchy40"},{"type":"dd96","tag_id":"6","section_id":"1","section_tipo":"rsc167","component_tipo":"rsc36","section_top_id":"1","section_top_tipo":"oh1","from_component_tipo":"hierarchy40"}]

parameters.name: ar_locators_key
parameters.description: current array key selector. Default is '0'

post.description: Exec a search against transcription column in audiovisual table

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: String to search

parameters.name: search_mode
parameters.description: SQL type of search. Default is 'full_text_search'

parameters.name: rows_per_page
parameters.description: Number of records returned by page. Default is 10

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: Current page number (pagination params)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset used to paginate results. Default is 0

parameters.name: apperances_limit
parameters.description: Max number of apperances (matches) calculated. Default is 1

parameters.name: match_select
parameters.description: Selects specific match inside results. Default = false . Optional

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Exec total records count. Default is true

parameters.name: image_type
parameters.description: Type of image returned. Options are posterframe | identify_image.  Default is posterframe

parameters.name: list_fragment
parameters.description: Resolve text fragment to show in list mode (small text, without video cut). Default is true

parameters.name: video_fragment
parameters.description: Activates video fragment resolution (with extended transcription fragment and video cut). Default is false

parameters.name: fragment_terms
parameters.description: Calculates terms (indexations) for current fragment of transcription. Default is false

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Apply a filter to result like 'section_tipo = 1'

post.description: Get full reel data. Complete transcription without tc cut. Used when you need show full interview (mode full)

parameters.name: av_section_id
parameters.description: Section id number to filter records

parameters.name: image_type
parameters.description: Type of image returned. Options are posterframe | identify_image.  Default is posterframe

parameters.name: terms
parameters.description: Resolves current transcription indexed terms. Default is false
